paragraphs.text:
%spark
import scala.io.Source
import java.util.Arrays
import java.nio.file.{Paths, Files}
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets

import org.datavec.api.transform.TransformProcess
import org.datavec.api.transform.transform.nlp.TextToTermIndexSequenceTransform
import org.datavec.api.transform.schema.Schema

msg.data:
import scala.io.Source
import java.util.Arrays
import java.nio.file.{Paths, Files}
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets
import org.datavec.api.transform.TransformProcess
import org.datavec.api.transform.transform.nlp.TextToTermIndexSequenceTransform
import org.datavec.api.transform.schema.Schema

paragraphs.text:
%spark
//read in vocabulary 
val VOCABFILE = "/opt/skil/plugins/files/resume_vocab"
val wordsFile = Source.fromFile(VOCABFILE.toString).getLines().toSeq
val wordsLst  = wordsFile.map(x => x.split("/n")).toList(0).toList.asJava

msg.data:
VOCABFILE: String = /opt/skil/plugins/files/resume_vocab
wordsFile: Seq[String] = Stream(...wordsLst: java.util.List[String] = [UNK, a, aarp, ab, abilities, ability, able, about, abovementioned, absolute, academic, academy, accelerate, accept, acceptance, access, accessible, accident, accomplished, accomplishments, accordance, according, accordingly, account, accounting, accounts, accuracy, accurate, accurately, achieve, achieved, achievement, achiever, achieving, achs, acquired, acquisition, acquisitions, across, act, action, actions, activates, active, actively, activities, activity, actrivex, actual, acute, acv, ad, adam, adama, adapt, adaptable, add, added, adding, additional, address, addressed, adidas, adjust, adjustments, admin, administrating, administration, administrative, administrator, adobe, adope, adopting, adoptive, adress, advanced, advancement, advancing, adva...

paragraphs.text:
%spark
//create transformer
val schema = new Schema.Builder()
    .addColumnString("text")
    .build()
    
val tp = new TransformProcess.Builder(schema)
    .convertToSequence()
    .transform(new TextToTermIndexSequenceTransform("text", "sequence", wordsLst, " ", false))
    .build()
